parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the specified container cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeGroupedContainerInstances](~~DescribeGroupedContainerInstances~~) operation to query the ID of the container cluster.

parameters.name: Criteria
parameters.description: The search condition for the image baseline.

parameters.name: CriteriaType
parameters.description:
The type of the search condition. Valid values:

*   **BaselineNameAlias**: baseline name
*   **BaselineClassAlias**: baseline category

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: RiskLevel
parameters.description:
The severity of the image baseline that you want to query. Separate multiple severities with commas (,). Valid values:

*   **high**
*   **medium**
*   **low**

parameters.name: ScanRange
parameters.description: The types of the assets that you want to scan.
